entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow changing to a few rain showers or drizzle near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon then west 30 gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
